discourse_list.title: Articles: MakerDAO deploys on layer-2 network StarkNet to enhance functions of DAI stablecoin

content.content: As I was doing some reading I noticed a few articles pertaining to StarkNet. See a couple of the links below. Do we need someone to fact check these ?     coindesk.com – 20 Apr 22    Ethereum DeFi Staple MakerDAO Adds StarkNet Bridge in First Step Toward... Rebuilding Maker on StarkNet involves four phases, starting with a simple bridge that goes live on April 28.         Cointelegraph    MakerDAO deploys on layer-2 network StarkNet to enhance functions of DAI... Maker's multichain strategy was first implemented in the launch of a DAI token bridge on Optimism in March 2021, and succeeded by a similar service on Arbitrum One in September.
So far I have read accurate information, if you want you can comment on what you found controversial and needs verification.

Thanks. I haven’t found anything per se but there are people with far more knowledge than me. I posted it because over the past few weeks there have been articles published about Maker that have been less than completely accurate so I was wondering how this batch is looking.
I recommend you the youtuber “filosofía código”, he is funded by the Ethereum foundation to teach
Hello Sir, these articles were written because of the PR made and distributed by the Maker Brand Team with the help of @pyramidmaker for Starknet CU.
Nice! That’s good to know. Glad the information is not coming from thin air. Looking forward to seeing the Maker name all over.
